info.name: Gildan Adult Ultra Cotton T-Shirt, Style G2000, Multipack
info.desc: A premium cotton t-shirt featuring a bold mountain print. Designed for everyday comfort with a modern streetwear vibe.

description.p_1: Made from high-quality ultra cotton, this t-shirt offers a thick yet breathable fabric that delivers superior comfort and long-lasting durability. The material feels soft against the skin while remaining strong enough for everyday wear.
description.p_2: The classic fit provides a relaxed silhouette suitable for all body types. Reinforced stitching at the neckline, sleeves, and hem ensures the shirt maintains its shape even after repeated washing.
description.p_3: Featuring a bold mountain graphic, this t-shirt adds a modern streetwear edge to your outfit. It pairs effortlessly with jeans, joggers, or layered looks for casual and urban styling.
description.p_4: Ideal for casual wear, branding, or custom printing, this multipack t-shirt adapts to various uses. The fabric retains color vibrancy and resists fading over time.
description.p_5: Designed for long-term use, the Gildan Ultra Cotton T-Shirt maintains its structure, softness, and appearance even after frequent washing, making it a reliable wardrobe essential.

productDetails.careInstructions: Machine wash cold, tumble dry low, do not bleach
productDetails.printingCompatibility: Suitable for screen printing, DTG, and heat transfer

reviews.title: Excellent quality and fit
reviews.comment: The fabric feels thick and premium. After several washes it still looks brand new. Definitely worth the price.

reviews.title: Very comfortable
reviews.comment: Comfortable and breathable. The design looks great and the size fits perfectly. Would buy again.

reviews.title: Good but a bit thick
reviews.comment: Quality is solid, but the fabric is slightly heavier than expected. Still a good everyday shirt.
